com.facebook.litho.config

Class ComponentsConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.config.ComponentsConfiguration

  • public class ComponentsConfiguration
extends Object
    Hi there, traveller! This configuration class is not meant to be used by end-users of Litho. It contains mainly flags for features that are either under active development and not ready for public consumption, or for use in experiments. These values are safe defaults and should not require manual changes.

      Runtime Size for ArrayBatchAllocation Batch Size

      Startup Size for ArrayBatchAllocator Batch Size
      static boolean assignTransitionKeysToAllOutputs
      Assign transition keys to all LayoutOutputs, this enables Transition.allLayout()
      static boolean asyncInitRange
      If true, the async range calculation isn't blocked on the first item finishing layout and it will schedule one layout per bg thread during init range.
      static boolean bgScheduleAllInitRange
      If true, the async range calculation isn't blocked on the first item finishing layout and it will schedule as many bg layouts as it can while init range completes.
      static boolean boostAffinityLayoutStateFuture
      If true, the affinityBoosterFactory will be used to bump the LayoutStateFuture thread that the main thread is waiting on a powerful core.
      static boolean boostAffinityLithoLayouts
      If true, the affinityBoosterFactory will be used to bump all threads that are calculating a layout to a powerful core.
      static boolean CAN_CHECK_GLOBAL_ANIMATOR_SETTINGS
      Whether we can access properties in Settings.Global for animations.
      static boolean createPhantomLayoutOutputsForTransitions 
      static boolean debugHighlightInteractiveBounds
      Debug option to highlight interactive areas in mounted components.

      Debug option to highlight mount bounds of mounted components.

      Whether the OnShouldCreateLayoutWithNewSizeSpec is used with Layout Spec with size spec.

      static boolean forceEnableTransitionsForInstrumentationTests
      By default end-to-end tests will disable transitions and this flag lets to explicitly enable transitions to test animation related behavior.

      Default for ComponentHost#hasOverlappingRendering.

      Whether incremental mount should also be done when the LithoView is not visible at all (i.e.
      static boolean inheritPriorityFromUiThread
      Whether the background thread that's currently running the layout should have its priority raised to the thread priority of the UI thread.
      static boolean insertPostAsyncLayout
      If true, insert operations with the RecyclerBinder will not start async layout calculations for the items in range, instead these layout calculations will be posted to the next frame.

      If true then we'll lazily initialize the LayoutStateOutputIdCalculator
      static boolean NEEDS_THEME_SYNCHRONIZATION
      Whether we need to account for lack of synchronization while accessing Themes.
      static int nodeTreePersistenceMode
      Sets the node tree persistence mode to hold the internal nodes in memory.
      static boolean onlyProcessAutogeneratedTransitionIdsWhenNecessary
      Enables more smart approach to processing autogenerated transition ids in TransitionManager.setupTransitions(), taking into account whether there are transitions that target all layout, and the fact that appear/disappear animations cannot be defined for autogenerated ids

    • Field Detail

      • YOGA_LOGGER

        public static YogaLogger YOGA_LOGGER

      • IS_INTERNAL_BUILD

        public static final boolean IS_INTERNAL_BUILD
        Indicates whether this is an internal build. Note that the implementation of BuildConfig that this class is compiled against may not be the one that is included in the APK. See: android_build_config.

      • USE_INCREMENTAL_MOUNT_HELPER

        public static final boolean USE_INCREMENTAL_MOUNT_HELPER
        Indicates that the incremental mount helper is required for this build.

      • ARE_TRANSITIONS_SUPPORTED

        public static final boolean ARE_TRANSITIONS_SUPPORTED
        Whether transitions are supported for this API version.

      • CAN_CHECK_GLOBAL_ANIMATOR_SETTINGS

        public static final boolean CAN_CHECK_GLOBAL_ANIMATOR_SETTINGS
        Whether we can access properties in Settings.Global for animations.

      • NEEDS_THEME_SYNCHRONIZATION

        public static final boolean NEEDS_THEME_SYNCHRONIZATION
        Whether we need to account for lack of synchronization while accessing Themes.

      • isDebugModeEnabled

        public static boolean isDebugModeEnabled
        Option to enabled debug mode. This will save extra data asscociated with each node and allow more info about the hierarchy to be retrieved. Used to enable stetho integration. It is highly discouraged to enable this in production builds. Due to how the Litho releases are distributed in open source IS_INTERNAL_BUILD will always be false. It is therefore required to override this value using your own application build configs. Recommended place for this is in a Application subclass onCreate() method.

      • debugHighlightInteractiveBounds

        public static boolean debugHighlightInteractiveBounds
        Debug option to highlight interactive areas in mounted components.

      • enableLithoViewDebugOverlay

        public static boolean enableLithoViewDebugOverlay
        LithoView overlay showing whether its ComponentTree was computed on UI thread (red) or bg thread (green).

      • debugHighlightMountBounds

        public static boolean debugHighlightMountBounds
        Debug option to highlight mount bounds of mounted components.

      • isEndToEndTestRun

        public static boolean isEndToEndTestRun
        Populates additional metadata to find mounted components at runtime. Defaults to the presence of an 
        IS_TESTING
        system property at startup but can be overridden at runtime.

      • enableOnErrorHandling

        public static boolean enableOnErrorHandling
        Enable exception delegation to OnError.

      • setRootAsyncRecyclerCollectionComponent

        public static boolean setRootAsyncRecyclerCollectionComponent
        Whether the RecyclerCollectionComponent can asynchronously set the root of a SectionTree.

      • insertPostAsyncLayout

        public static boolean insertPostAsyncLayout
        If true, insert operations with the RecyclerBinder will not start async layout calculations for the items in range, instead these layout calculations will be posted to the next frame.

      • useGlobalKeys

        public static boolean useGlobalKeys
        If false, global keys will not be generated (litho level state updates won't work). It's highly discouraged to to change this to false, unless you handle all your updates outside of the litho framework

      • DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_THREAD_PRIORITY

        public static final int DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_THREAD_PRIORITY
        The default priority for threads that perform background layout calculations.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • defaultChangeSetThreadPriority

        public static int defaultChangeSetThreadPriority

      • useBatchArrayAllocator

        public static boolean useBatchArrayAllocator
        If true then we'll allocate YogaEdgesWithIntsImplOptimized arrays in batches

      • lazilyInitializeLayoutStateOutputIdCalculator

        public static boolean lazilyInitializeLayoutStateOutputIdCalculator
        If true then we'll lazily initialize the LayoutStateOutputIdCalculator

      • unmountAllWhenComponentTreeSetToNull

        public static boolean unmountAllWhenComponentTreeSetToNull
        Whether to unmount all contents of LithoView when its ComponentTree is set to null.

      • forceEnableTransitionsForInstrumentationTests

        public static boolean forceEnableTransitionsForInstrumentationTests
        By default end-to-end tests will disable transitions and this flag lets to explicitly enable transitions to test animation related behavior.

      • threadPoolForBackgroundThreadsConfig

        public static LayoutThreadPoolConfiguration threadPoolForBackgroundThreadsConfig
        Configuration for creating a thread pool of threads used for background layout. If null, a single default thread will be used for background layout.

      • useSingleThreadPool

        public static boolean useSingleThreadPool
        If true, a single thread pool will be used instead of creating one per RecyclerBinder.

      • updateStateAsync

        public static boolean updateStateAsync
        Configuration for asynchronous state update

      • useStateHandlers

        public static boolean useStateHandlers
        If false, we won't create state handlers. It's highly discouraged to to change this to false, unless you handle all your updates outside of the litho framework

      • hostHasOverlappingRendering

        public static boolean hostHasOverlappingRendering
        Default for ComponentHost#hasOverlappingRendering.

      • variableArrayBatchAllocatorEnabled

        public static boolean variableArrayBatchAllocatorEnabled
        Enable variable BatchSize for ArrayBatchAllocator

      • arrayBatchAllocatorStartupSize

        public static int arrayBatchAllocatorStartupSize
        Startup Size for ArrayBatchAllocator Batch Size

      • arrayBatchAllocationRuntimeSize

        public static int arrayBatchAllocationRuntimeSize
        Runtime Size for ArrayBatchAllocation Batch Size

      • prewarmImageTexture

        public static boolean prewarmImageTexture

      • usePlaceholderComponent

        public static boolean usePlaceholderComponent
        Whether we should use the PlaceholderComponent instead of Column as MountSpec holder.

      • asyncInitRange

        public static boolean asyncInitRange
        If true, the async range calculation isn't blocked on the first item finishing layout and it will schedule one layout per bg thread during init range.

      • bgScheduleAllInitRange

        public static boolean bgScheduleAllInitRange
        If true, the async range calculation isn't blocked on the first item finishing layout and it will schedule as many bg layouts as it can while init range completes.

      • useSharedLayoutStateFuture

        public static boolean useSharedLayoutStateFuture
        If true, a layout for the same ComponentTree will be calculated on a single thread at the same time.

      • threadPoolConfiguration

        public static LayoutThreadPoolConfiguration threadPoolConfiguration
        If non-null, a thread pool will be used for async layouts instead of a single layout thread.

      • enableThreadTracingStacktrace

        public static boolean enableThreadTracingStacktrace

      • incrementalMountWhenNotVisible

        public static boolean incrementalMountWhenNotVisible
        Whether incremental mount should also be done when the LithoView is not visible at all (i.e. so that all of the mount items should be unmounted).

      • useDisplayListForAllDrawables

        public static boolean useDisplayListForAllDrawables
        Whether all drawables are eligible for wrapping into DisplayListDrawables

      • inheritPriorityFromUiThread

        public static boolean inheritPriorityFromUiThread
        Whether the background thread that's currently running the layout should have its priority raised to the thread priority of the UI thread.

      • disablePools

        public static boolean disablePools

      • affinityBoosterFactory

        @Nullable
public static LithoAffinityBoosterFactory affinityBoosterFactory

      • boostAffinityLayoutStateFuture

        public static boolean boostAffinityLayoutStateFuture
        If true, the affinityBoosterFactory will be used to bump the LayoutStateFuture thread that the main thread is waiting on a powerful core.

      • boostAffinityLithoLayouts

        public static boolean boostAffinityLithoLayouts
        If true, the affinityBoosterFactory will be used to bump all threads that are calculating a layout to a powerful core.

      • enableShouldCreateLayoutWithNewSizeSpec

        public static boolean enableShouldCreateLayoutWithNewSizeSpec
        Whether the OnShouldCreateLayoutWithNewSizeSpec is used with Layout Spec with size spec. This will also disable the associated layout caching.

      • allowAnimatingDrawables

        public static boolean allowAnimatingDrawables
        Whether we allow animating drawables' properties (other than bounds)

      • assignTransitionKeysToAllOutputs

        public static boolean assignTransitionKeysToAllOutputs
        Assign transition keys to all LayoutOutputs, this enables Transition.allLayout()

      • createPhantomLayoutOutputsForTransitions

        public static boolean createPhantomLayoutOutputsForTransitions

      • onlyProcessAutogeneratedTransitionIdsWhenNecessary

        public static boolean onlyProcessAutogeneratedTransitionIdsWhenNecessary
        Enables more smart approach to processing autogenerated transition ids in TransitionManager.setupTransitions(), taking into account whether there are transitions that target all layout, and the fact that appear/disappear animations cannot be defined for autogenerated ids

      • shouldSetBaselineFunctionOnYogaNode

        public static boolean shouldSetBaselineFunctionOnYogaNode

      • isNestedTreeResolutionExperimentEnabled

        public static boolean isNestedTreeResolutionExperimentEnabled
        Whether the refactored implementation of nested tree resolution should be used.

      • shouldIncreaseThreadPriorityToUrgentDisplay

        public static boolean shouldIncreaseThreadPriorityToUrgentDisplay

      • nodeTreePersistenceMode

        public static int nodeTreePersistenceMode
        Sets the node tree persistence mode to hold the internal nodes in memory. i.e. do not release them immediately. 0 is disabled, 1 is release before calculating a new layout and 2 is release after calculating new layout.
